com.salimov.yurii.entity

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Model<java.lang.Long>
      • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Response
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    @Entity
public final class Response
extends Model<java.lang.Long>
    The class implements a set of standard methods for working with entity of the Response class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Model, Serialized Form

      • isValidated

        public static boolean isValidated(Response response)
        Statically validates the response. Response is valid if it is a valid model object and it has username and text.
